message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
Okay, I'll lower my share a bit, but I still need to make sure I get a good portion. 850k for me, 150k for you.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I need to get more than 150k to make it worthwhile. Let's try 60/40.
I'm getting impatient here, Bob. This is my last offer - 750k for me, 250k for you.  If you reject this, we're both going to end up with nothing.
